attributes.action: Ban all toy guns and knives including replicas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ban all toy guns and knives including replicas as they serve no
     useful purpose. By removing & educating this could help reduce
     crime, violence and death by removing concept/use from children
     / youths / adults of today that they are un-acceptable and a
     potential danger in this fast changing society we live in.
